Descriptions.ShortDescription: Get rid of those pesky clouds
Descriptions.LongDescription:
# Zarkov Cloudbuster plugin #
The massively successful Zarkov Cloud Gun now comes in plugin form.
Just add it to your arsenal of useful plugins.

## Plugin Instructions ##

* The instruction is useful to clear skies at the start of the night.
* The trigger can be used to keep skies clear while you're imaging.


### Disclaimer: This plugin cannot (yet) be relied on completely, always keep a close eye on your gear just in case the plugin doesn't work. It's not recommended trying this out in the rain. Please rely on common sense more than this plugin. ###
